articles.title: Tensions escalate as Pakistan calls India's operation 'an act of war' - NPR
articles.description: Pakistan says India's strikes on Wednesday is "an act of war." India's military described its operation as targeting "terrorist infrastructure."
articles.content:
India hit multiple targets across Pakistan in the most widespread strikes in decades early Wednesday. 
New Delhi described its operation as a response to a deadly attack in India-administered Kashmi… [+5249 chars]
